title: Main Commands
description:
Here's the list of stuff I can do!
PM SpikeyRobot ({prefix}pmspikey) or join [my Discord server](https://discord.gg/ZbKfYSQ) for questions or just to say hi!
See [spikeybot.com](https://www.spikeybot.com/) for examples and more information.

rows.description: I will send you a link to add me to your server!

examples.result: Replies with a link that will allow you to add the bot to your own server.

rows.description: Send this message to you.
Make me say something.

examples.result: Your message gets deleted (if the bot has permission to manage messages), and the bot says "Hello World!" in the same channel.

rows.description: Create a NPC that replaces everything you say.

examples.result: This will create a webhook that will send messages as a bot named 'A Cool NPC' with the linked profile picture, and delete your messages. The profile picture is optional, and can also be uploaded as an attachment to the message with the command. This is disabled by default, you can give permission to use it with the `enable` command (ex: `{prefix}enable become #roleplay`).
Same as Basic Usage, but creates it in the #roleplay channel.
Running the command without any arguments, will disable the text replacement.
Running the command without any arguments, will disable the text replacement.

rows.description: List all characters created with `become`.

examples.result: All characters in all channels will be listed.

rows.description: Set a timer for a certain number of seconds. The bot will DM you the message at the end. No options lists timers.

examples.command: timer 1 It has been one minute!
examples.result: After 60 seconds, the bot will send you a direct message saying "It has been one minute!".

examples.command: timer 60 It has been one hour!
examples.result: After 1 hour, the bot will send you a direct message saying "It has been one hour!".

After 2 days, the bot will send you a direct message saying "Your timer for 2880 minutes is over!".
(s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days, w = weeks, mon = mon, or use the whole word for each)
After 20 minutes, the bot will send you a direct message saying "Your timer for 20 minutes is over!".
Will reply telling you which timers of yours it currently knows about.

rows.description: Schedule a command to be run after a certain amount of time.

examples.result: Currently scheduled commands will be listed, and who scheduled the command.

examples.command: schedule 1h {prefix}say It has been one hour!
examples.result: After 1 hour, the bot will run the {prefix}say command in the channel that you ran your command.

examples.command: schedule after 1 hour {prefix}say It has been one hour!
examples.result: After 1 hour, the bot will run the {prefix}say command in the channel that you ran your command.

examples.description: Schedule a command in 2 hours, to repeat every week afterwards.
examples.result: In 2 hours, and for every week afterwards, {prefix}hg autoplay will be run.

examples.description: Schedule a command in 2 hours, to repeat every week afterwards.
examples.command: schedule after 2 hours, repeat every 1 week {prefix}hg autoplay
examples.result: In 2 hours, and for every week afterwards, {prefix}hg autoplay will be run.
Cancel the scheduled command with the ID of xyz.

rows.description: Manage Twitch notifications in text channels.

examples.result: Lists all current text channels and the notifications configured in each channel.

The bot will start notifying you in the channel where the command was run, when SpikeyRobot starts streaming on Twitch. (Aliases: add, subscribe, sub, notify, notifications, on, enable, alert, a, notification)
The alert for SpikeyRobot's stream will be removed from the channel where the command was run.

rows.description: Start a poll or vote in the chat. Each user may only have 1 poll at a time.

examples.result: The bot will begin a poll to find out if pigs are dirty and add reactions for users to vote with by clicking.
After 5 minutes, the bot will show the results from the poll, and delete the original poll. (Use 's' for seconds, 'm' for minutes, 'h' for hours, 'd' for days)

examples.command: poll 1h Which emoji is the best? [üí© Poop is best][üçî Cheeeezeburgerz][Fly away! ‚úà]
examples.result: üí©, üçî, and ‚úà emojis and text will be used as poll options. Up to 25 custom options can be used. After 1 hour, the bot will end the poll.

rows.description: End a poll that you created.

examples.result: Your current poll will be ended, and the results will be shown.

rows.description: Start a game of UNO! in the server text channels. (Sill in BETA. Sorry if it breaks.)

examples.result: Starts a game of UNO with you as the lobby host. Text channels are created for each player that is invited, and one for the lobby channel.
Starts UNO with @SpikeyRobot.

rows.description: Play a game of Tic Tac Toe with someone! (Mention someone to challenge them)

examples.result: Starts a game of tic-tac-toe in the chat. Second person to make a move becomes player 2.
Starts a game of tic-tac-toe in the chat and SpikeyRobot will be player 2.

rows.description: Start a game of Connect 4 against someone! (Mention someone to challenge them)

examples.result: Starts a game of connect4 in the chat. Second person to make a move becomes player 2.
Starts a game of connect4 in the chat and SpikeyRobot will be player 2.

rows.description: I have an unlimited supply of coins! I will flip one for you!

examples.result: Replies with either Heads or Tails as well as an image of such.
Flips 3 coins.

rows.description: Roll dice with any number of sides. Separate multiple numbers with spaces to roll multiple dice.

examples.result: Replies with a value between 1 and 6 as if a die with 6 sides had been rolled.
Replies with a value between 1 and 6 for each die, as well as the total sum of both the rolled values.

examples.description: Roll two 6-sided dice using a multiplier
examples.result: Replies with a value between 1 and 6 for each die, as well as the total sum of both the rolled values.

examples.description: Roll two 6-sided dice using D&D style
examples.result: Replies with a value between 1 and 6 for each die, as well as the total sum of both the rolled values.

examples.description: Roll three 20-sided dice using a multiplier
examples.result: Replies with a value between 1 and 20 for each of the three dice, as well as the sum, mean, median, and mode of all three rolled values.

examples.description: Roll three 20-sided dice using D&D style
examples.result: Replies with a value between 1 and 20 for each of the three dice, as well as the sum, mean, median, and mode of all three rolled values.
Rolls 3 20-sided, 4 6-sided and 8 10-sided dice, and shows sum, mean, median, and mode of all dice rolled.

examples.description: Roll multiple types of dice using D&D style
examples.result: Rolls 3 20-sided, 4 6-sided and 8 10-sided dice, and shows sum, mean, median, and mode of all dice rolled.

rows.description: Add positive or negative numbers separated by spaces.

examples.result: The bot will add the 3 numbers and reply with "111".
The bot will add the 4 numbers and reply with "-61".
The bot will add the 4 numbers and reply with "17".

rows.description: Simplify an equation with numbers and variables.
Solve an equation for each variable in the equation.

examples.result:
```x = 291```
Notice: Exponents don't follow order of operations properly, you should surround them in parentheses.

rows.description: Solve a math problem, and convert units.
Find dy/dx of an equation.
Graph an equation, Maxes and mins are all optional, but brackets are required.

examples.description: User Defined Graph Domain and Range

rows.description: Lookup the definition to a word.

examples.result: A reply with a bunch of information about the word will be sent.

rows.description: I will tell you the date you created your account!

examples.result: The bot will tell you the date you created your account in the Los Angeles timezone.
The bot will tell you the date SpikeyRobot created their account in the Los Angeles timezone.

rows.description: I will tell you the date you joined the server you sent the message from!

examples.result: The bot will tell you the date you joined the server where you sent the message, in the Los Angeles timezone.
The bot will tell you the date SpikeyRobot joined the server where you sent the message, in the Los Angeles timezone.

rows.description: Information about the current server will be sent including links to images.

examples.result: The bot will tell you information about the server.

rows.description: Get information about the specified emoji.

examples.result: The bot will tell you information about all of the emotes you typed. More information is given if you only type one emote.

rows.description: I will introduce myself to you!

examples.result: The bot will send you a direct message giving a brief description about itself.

rows.description: I will send SpikeyRobot (my creator) your message because you are too shy!

examples.command: pmspikey You should totally add blockchain to the bot!
examples.result: The bot will send a direct message to @SpikeyRobot#0971 telling him to add your ridiculous feature idea.

rows.description: Need a better look at your profile pic? I'll show you the original.

examples.result: Your profile picture will be sent as a reply to your command.
SpikeyRobot's profile picture will be sent as a reply to your command.

rows.description: List all servers where user has been banned.

examples.result: The list of servers where the bot knows RoboSoupCan has been banned and the reason for each ban will be shown. (Bot needs permission to view ban list on server for ban to show up).

rows.description: Want to know what my delay to the server is? I can tell you my ping!

examples.result: The bot will reply with the delay in milliseconds between the bot and Discord's server that it is connected to, as well as the 3 previous values.

rows.description: Displays statistics about the bot and the servers it's on.

examples.result: The bot will reply with information about the number of users, number Discord servers (guilds), and similar data.

rows.description: Check your current Patreon status, or get information on how to become a patron.
Using Google's text-to-speech engine, make the bot say something in your voice channel.

examples.result: The bot will join your voice channel and speak "Hello World"
